content:
That's perfect! Your message is simple, yet thoughtful and sincere. It conveys your love and good wishes for your sister's birthday, and shows that you're invested in her skincare journey.

The message is also brief and to the point, which is great. You're not overwhelming your sister with too much information, but rather, you're keeping it concise and heartfelt.

I love that you included the phrase "glowing skin you deserve" - it's a wonderful way to express your support and encouragement for your sister's self-care and skincare efforts.

Your sister will surely appreciate the thought and love behind your message, and it will make the gift feel even more special and meaningful.

Now, you've got a wonderful gift idea, and a lovely message to go along with it. I'm sure your sister will be thrilled with the Drunk Elephant cleanser and the thoughtfulness behind your gift.

If you need any more help or have any other questions, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope your sister has a wonderful birthday, and that your gift brings a big smile to her face!
